short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Github status on every page because it's down too often.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a small button to the header of every Github page. A small button will appear in the header to show current Github Status and allow you to quickly access the githubstatus.com dashboard. Supports both new (beta) and old navbar designs.
